page.title: 17ST.MARY'S W.CHILTINGTON
page.content: { St.Mary's Church W.Chiltington:}Our village church has a 300 year old wooden spire with a{weather cock.}Its roof is made of large slabs of{Horsham stone and it has very thick walls made of different local stones.Its{5 bells are only chimed now and not pealed. Some parts are 800 years old.Inside the{walls are painted}with pictures of Jesus' life. One warns people about breaking the laws of the{Sabbath. { }It has a long{squint hole}that the {Rector}says was to put naughty{Choir {Boys}down but it was really for people to see the{Priest}at the{Altar. { The Rector's day. St.Mary's Thakeham Up at 7am; prayers with my wife; work in study.Go to Crematorium in Worthing for a funeral. Visit a widow, then to {Rydon School Choir.}Answer phone. Take {Confirmation class.}See couple about to be married. Lock church, go to bed.
